attributes.action: Laws to be introduced to protect Visitor and Residents' rights in care homes
attributes.additional_details:
Your Voice Matters CIC Campaign Rights 2 Speak Up 4 Care
http://www.yourvoicematters.org.uk/rights2speakup4care 

My story.  The reason our organisation was established in 2010. Banned 
http://www.yourvoicematters.org.uk/jenny-moore
attributes.background: Your Voice Matters CIC have campaigned since 2010 on the issue of banning and evictions in care homes. Nov 2016 - national exposure and mention in Parliamentary Adjournment Debate 3 Nov. We want to see laws introduced to protect visitors and residents who raise concerns to care home providers.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly the specific change that you would like Parliament to make to the law.
